levelDescription: This is outside.
This is a greenhouse.
This is a porch.

The door closes behind you, leaving you alone in the darkness. Suddenly, everything lights up and you find yourself on the beach. There's a Lighthouse right infront of you up the hill(NORTH), a shipwreck by the coast(EAST) and what looks to be a shed to your left(WEST) by the seaside. Which way do you decide to go?
While making your way up the hill you encouter a gate blocking your path.
You stand outside the lighthouse, do you decide to go?
This is the lighthouse, There's a staircase that leads up to the 2nd floor.
This is the top floor in the lighthouse
You stand outside the shed, do you decide to go in?.
You stand inside the shed. There's a ladder leading down to the basement(NORTH)
You find yourself in the basement of the shed.
You see a shipwreck in the distant, do you decide to explore it?
You find yourself inside the old rustic shipwreck. The captains cabin is to your right(EAST)
You are currently inside the captains cabin.
You enter a dark room, you hear a faint sobbing. The only light there is is shining through the bottom of a door to your left. In front of you is a hallway leading seemingly into nothingness.
In the room, there's a desk with a wooden chair and a torch hanging on the wall. It seems the torch isn't bolted to the wall.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
A pitch black room, you can barely see your hands in front of you.
This is the Living Room
This is the Kitchen
This is the Hall
This is the Upper Floor
This is the Attic
This is the Bedroom
This is the Basement
This is a room with a white crib in it.
This is the main hall. Cobweb covers the walls...
This room is filled with babythings. The walls have painted unicorns and the shelves are filled with toys. Only thing missing is the crib..
A nursing room.. and a changing table. A funky smell surrounds this room..
A study. A nice comfy chair, books on the shelves and a decanter filled with a golden liquid and a used glass. Dust everywhere.
This room is a mess. Broken bottles and thrashed books. A nursery rhyme is scribbled on the walls...
